org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.parsing.as

Class BaseRawASTokenizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.parsing.as.BaseRawTokenizer<ASToken>
      • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.parsing.as.BaseRawASTokenizer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RawASTokenizer

    public abstract class BaseRawASTokenizer
extends BaseRawTokenizer<ASToken>
    Base class for RawActionScriptTokenizer. Pulling out code into Java backing class so it's easier to deal with. Uses a token pool to avoid object creation. The token pool will keep a buffer of 10 tokens in memory, and it is generally unsafe to hold on to tokens passed the point they are needed. If tokens are to be preserved, their copy constructor should be used

    • Field Detail

      • isInCloseTag

        protected boolean isInCloseTag
        Tracks if we are in a close tag. Used in the generated code

      • e4xTagDepth

        protected int e4xTagDepth
        The depth of open tags, used to determine if we're still in E4X content. Each time we see a tag open, this count is incremented. When we see any kind of tag close () we decrement the counter.

      • e4xBraceBalance

        protected int e4xBraceBalance
        The depth of the braces in E4X content. Used to determine when to pop out of E4X databindings and back to E4X content

      • e4xReturnState

        protected int e4xReturnState
        State to return to from E4X. Used in the generated code

      • typedDepth

        protected int typedDepth
        Depth of typed collection constructs. Used in the generated code

      • docTypeLevel

        protected int docTypeLevel
        Nested '<' bracket level (for

      • collectComments

        protected boolean collectComments
        Flag to indicate we should collect comments

      • bufferToken

        protected ASToken bufferToken
        token that we may need to return for rules that may return more than one token
